Type.Name: DragDataReceivedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public sealed delegate void DragDataReceivedHandler (object o, Gtk.DragDataReceivedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DragDataReceivedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DragDataReceivedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DragDataReceivedHandler is removed from the event.
